topItems.title: CHEESEDOWN! Has vs NoRegreT - G1
topItems.excerpt: I cast a bo7 $100USD Showmatch between the two craziest players out there, Has and Noregret! Both play wild, aggressive, and all-in styles. They love proxies and 1-base plays and NEVER play standard. This series lived up to the hype as we decide who is the KING OF CHEESE! -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/x5_pig
